verses.text: \w My|strong="H7911"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w my|strong="H7911"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* \w my|strong="H7911"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w add|strong="H3254"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* thee \w length|strong="H0753"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* mercy \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* thee, put \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w neck|strong="H1621"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w write|strong="H3789"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* tables \w of|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* thou shalt \w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w understanding|strong="H7922"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

\w Have|strong="H3068"\w* \w confidence|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w lean|strong="H8172"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* thy own prudence.

\w In|strong="H1870"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* think \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* direct thy steps.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w own|strong="H1961"\w* conceit: \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*:

\w For|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* health \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w navel|strong="H8270"\w*, \w and|strong="H1961"\w* moistening \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*.

Honour \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w substance|strong="H1952"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* give \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H7225"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w fruits|strong="H7225"\w*:

\w And|strong="H8492"\w* thy \w barns|strong="H0618"\w* shall be \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w abundance|strong="H7647"\w*, \w and|strong="H8492"\w* thy \w presses|strong="H3342"\w* shall run over \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w reject|strong="H3988"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w correction|strong="H4148"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* faint \w when|strong="H1121"\w* thou art chastised \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H4148"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* loveth, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* chastiseth: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* pleaseth \w himself|strong="H7521"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \w is|strong="H2451"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* that findeth \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w is|strong="H2451"\w* rich \w in|strong="H4672"\w* prudence:

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* purchasing thereof \w is|strong="H3701"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w merchandise|strong="H5504"\w* \w of|strong="H3701"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* fruit \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* chiefest \w and|strong="H3701"\w* purest \w gold|strong="H2742"\w*:

\w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* riches: \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3808"\w* \w desired|strong="H2656"\w*, \w are|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* compared \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w Length|strong="H0753"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H3117"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H3117"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.

\w Her|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w are|strong="H1870"\w* beautiful \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w paths|strong="H5410"\w* \w are|strong="H1870"\w* peaceable.

\w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H2388"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w to|strong="H6086"\w* \w them|strong="H2388"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* lay \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* \w on|strong="H6086"\w* \w her|strong="H8551"\w*: \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w retain|strong="H2388"\w* \w her|strong="H8551"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w blessed|strong="H0833"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* hath \w founded|strong="H3245"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, hath \w established|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* prudence.

\w By|strong="H7834"\w* \w his|strong="H1847"\w* wisdom \w the|strong="H1234"\w* \w depths|strong="H8415"\w* have \w broken|strong="H1234"\w* \w out|strong="H1234"\w*, \w and|strong="H1847"\w* \w the|strong="H1234"\w* \w clouds|strong="H7834"\w* grow thick \w with|strong="H7491"\w* \w dew|strong="H2919"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5341"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* these \w things|strong="H5341"\w* \w depart|strong="H3868"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* \w the|strong="H5869"\w* law \w and|strong="H1121"\w* counsel:

\w And|strong="H5315"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* shalt thou \w walk|strong="H1870"\w* confidently \w in|strong="H1870"\w* thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w stumble|strong="H5062"\w*:

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H6342"\w*: thou shalt \w rest|strong="H7901"\w*, \w and|strong="H7901"\w* thy \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w sweet|strong="H6149"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H0935"\w* \w sudden|strong="H6597"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*, \w nor|strong="H0408"\w* \w of|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* power \w of|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* falling \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* thee.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* thy side, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w withhold|strong="H4513"\w* \w him|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w who|strong="H0410"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w able|strong="H3027"\w*: \w if|strong="H1961"\w* thou art \w able|strong="H3027"\w*, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* thyself \w also|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*: \w Go|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee: \w when|strong="H7725"\w* thou canst \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w at|strong="H7725"\w* \w present|strong="H5414"\w*.

Practise \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, \w when|strong="H3427"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* hath \w confidence|strong="H0983"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* thee.

\w Strive|strong="H7378"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w cause|strong="H2600"\w*, \w when|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* hath \w done|strong="H7451"\w* thee \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w Envy|strong="H7065"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* unjust \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* follow \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* every mocker \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* communication \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* simple.

Want \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*: \w but|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* habitations \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* scorn \w the|strong="H5414"\w* scorners, \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* meek \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7311"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* shall \w possess|strong="H5157"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*: \w the|strong="H7311"\w* promotion \w of|strong="H2450"\w* \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* \w is|strong="H3684"\w* \w disgrace|strong="H7036"\w*.
